page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: THERE ARE NO ORGANISED RECREATIONAL FACILITIES IN THE AREA THOUGH MANY VISITORS COME FOR THEIR REST AND RECREATION. FISHING IS THE MOST POPULAR PASTIME CLOSELY FOLLOWED BY CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING. EVERY HOUSE HAS A GARDEN SO MUCH TIME IS SPENT IN THIS PURSUIT. HORSE RIDING IS POPULAR AND EVERYONE HAS ACCESS TO A HORSE. BOATING AND SWIMMING IN THE BAY ARE PURSUITS FOR SUMMER. IN WINTER THE MAIN RECREATION IS WATCHING TELEVISION. OCCASIONAL WHIST DRIVES,COFFEE MORNINGS AND JUMBLE SALES ARE HELD TO RAISE FUNDS. IN AUGUST THERE IS AN OPEN DAY WHEN A CLAY PIGEON SHOOT,RAFT RACE AND BARN DANCE ARE ALL PART OF THE ENTERTAINMENT.
